channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Boeing names new CEO as it posts a loss of more than $1.4 billion in second quarter
item.description: Boeing has a new CEO. The company said Wednesday that aerospace industry veteran Robert “Kelly Ortberg will take over as CEO next week, replacing David Calhoun.

item.title: Canada team in Olympics women’s soccer loses appeal against FIFA docking points for drone spying
item.description: Canada has lost its appeal against being docked six points by FIFA in a drone-spying scandal in the Paris Olympics women’s soccer tournament.

item.title: The Latest: Project 2025’s director steps down, and Trump says Harris ‘doesn’t like Jewish people’
item.description: The director of the Heritage Foundation’s Project 2025 vision for a complete overhaul of the federal government has stepped down after blowback from Donald Trump’s campaign.
